name: Revenge of the Electro
description:
Revenge of the Electro is a game about breaking into a secret lab and destroying it. Unfortunately there was a containment breach and all subject escaped but that doesn't matter to you. All you care is to destroy this place, so you have to protect the device from power hungry monsters as it charge. Use what's left to help you and be careful what stalk in the shadows.

The game was made in 3 weeks for ROG4CREATORS game jam.
